Those Dang Dirty Apes!!

By Kotuza on Saturday, March 7, 2009 - 05:01 pm:

I believe Waranmo(Ape/Plant) is the only Ape in IMa tournaments, but I noticed something strange a few days ago. Waranmo is a C-Class Opponent, yet for some reason, he has Tasty Banana. Wait- Double You Tee Eff? Tasty Banana is a special tech, which you have to be B-Class to obtain... Are there any other monsters that are "cheating" in this way?

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, March 7, 2009 - 05:44 pm:

I think there are a couple of monsters like that, I just cannot recall off the top of my head.

That said, maybe his back story is that he was slated.

By Kotuza on Saturday, March 7, 2009 - 05:54 pm:

Huh... I'll look into it more; I'm about to raise a battle-only monster seeing as my cash pool is running a bit low.

By Kotuza on Monday, March 16, 2009 - 05:14 pm:

Well, seems that besides 1 or 2 errantry monsters, (which aren't really "officially" ranked) Waranmo is the only monster to have a special technique under B-Class. They sure made him special huh?
